long_description: Thick, chewy and oh-so yummy, the Clif Kid(TM) Organic ZBar gives your kids a healthy snack with the right kind of nutrition for their growing, active bodies. Each baked whole grain energy bar contains 12 essential vitamins and minerals that growing kids need every day. Does not contain trans fats or high fructose corn syrup. May contain traces of peanuts and/or tree nuts. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Thick, chewy and oh-so yummy, the Clif Kid(TM) Organic ZBar gives your kids a healthy snack with the right kind of nutrition for their growing, active bodies.
